sentences.english: When faced with such a situation, which do we believe?
sentences.chinese: 面對這樣一種情狀，我們該相信誰？

sentences.english: Indicating something with a certain state of itself outward.
sentences.chinese: 表示事物外現着自身的某種情狀。

sentences.english: Whvia concerning the mechanicing guargettingte of the equipment?
sentences.chinese: 設備的機械保證情狀如何？

definition: name and reality/how sth is portrayed and what it is actually like
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
to fool the world and usurp a good name (idiom)
to accumulate/to gather/to amass wealth by heavy taxation or other unscrupulous means/(science) convergent
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
